title.rendered: GME TX4610 5 WATT IP67 UHF CB RADIO

content.rendered:
GME TX4610 5 WATT IP67 UHF CB RADIO

GME TX4610 5 Watt IP67 UHF CB Radio available for order now through Automax 4×4! Order online, come in & see us or give us a call on (02) 6699 2744 for a quote!

The TX4610 has an IP67 ingress-protection rating, making it ideal for use in the most demanding environments.

This compact radio packs many features into a small chassis including a large, tri-colour backlit LCD display, 5 Digit Selcall, and 19 programmable receive-only channels.

The all-new IP67-rated microphone includes channel up/ down keys and a priority channel button making these functions a simple one-handed operation within a modern, waterproof and dustproof chassis.

The TX4610 can be installed using either the supplied metal mounting bracket, or flush mounted with the optional MK008B flush mount kit to suit your individual installation requirements.

The robust, high-quality design of the TX4610 will offer years of reliable operation in ATVs, farm machinery, and plant equipment.

Features;

  • Compact size
  • Ingress protection to IP67
  • User Selectable Priority Channel
  • User Selectable Open and Group Scan
  • User Adjustable Squelch
  • 5 Digit Selcall with Quiet Mode
  • 50 In-Built CTCSS Codes
  • 10 Selcall Memories
  • Tricolour Backlighting
  • ANI (Automatic Number Identification) and Alpha Labelling for Selcall.
  • 19 Extra User Programmable Receive Channels (403-520 MHz).
  • Australian Made
  • 5 Year Warranty

To view the full range of products available for your 4×4, CLICK HERE!

Follow us on Instagram and Facebook to keep up to date with what’s going on in our workshop!
